r.s: Developer tools for the Pyrus installer
r.d:
This package contains several custom commands for Pyrus.
Included are commands for:
* Creating PEAR2 and PECL package skeletons * `php pyrus.phar generate-pear2 MyNewPackage` * [generate-pear2 documentation][1] * Creating a package.xml file * `php pyrus.phar make` * [make documentation][2] * Packaging PEAR2 and PEAR releases * `php pyrus.phar package` * [package documentation][3] * Running phpt tests and generating code coverage reports * `php pyrus.phar run-phpt -m` * [run-phpt documentation][4]
For more information, read the [documentation][5].
[1]: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pyrus.commands.generatepear2.php [2]: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pyrus.commands.make.php [3]: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pyrus.commands.package.php [4]: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pyrus.commands.runphpt.php [5]: http://pear.php.net/manual/en/pyrus.developers.php
